_note: Song of Norway (1970-1997) - Royal Caribbean's FIRST SHIP! Historic vessel that pioneered the Viking Crown Lounge. Lengthened in 1978 in revolutionary 'stretching' procedure. Sold to Airtours in 1997, eventually scrapped in China. If you have videos of this legendary ship, please suggest them! Looking for: ship tours, historical footage, Viking Crown Lounge, the famous 1978 lengthening, dining, entertainment, stateroom tours, or documentaries about Royal Caribbean's founding vessel.
